generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and serene pop art design providing a peaceful conclusion. Against a solid sunshine yellow background with subtle, large-scale halftone dots, a single, stylized Greek bougainvillea vine rendered in vibrant magenta with bold black outlines gracefully curls up the left side of the card. A few stylized white doves, drawn with simple, thick black lines, fly from the vine towards the center. The design is clean, leaving the bottom-right corner completely empty and undecorated. The overall feeling is one of romantic tranquility, echoing the main color palette and motifs in a quiet, artistic way.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
A vibrant pop art wedding scene set against the iconic white buildings and blue domes of Santorini, Greece. The style is reminiscent of Roy Lichtenstein, with bold primary colors (cobalt blue, sunshine yellow, vibrant magenta), thick black outlines, and prominent Ben-Day dots for texture. In the center, a stylized cartoon couple, inspired by the reference, stands joyfully. The groom, a man with black hair and sunglasses, wears a sharp black suit. The bride, a woman with flowing brown hair, wears an elegant white wedding dress. Flanking them are two small, smiling children: a little flower girl in a yellow dress tossing pink petals, and a young ring bearer in a miniature suit holding a blue velvet pillow. The background features a split-panel comic book effect, one panel showing the Aegean Sea and the other the whitewashed architecture. In the upper central area, the text "Congratulations Michael & Alexis" is written in a beautiful, flowing, yet clear handwritten cursive script, rendered in a bright red. The entire scene is full of energy, love, and graphic impact, setting a joyful, romantic tone.

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided multiple reference photos as input images. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent the people in these reference photos with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS:
- REPRESENT ALL PEOPLE: If multiple reference photos are provided, create cartoon versions of ALL people shown, bringing them together in the same scene
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles worn by each person in their reference photo
- COMPLETE accessories: include ALL accessories visible on each person (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.)
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

The man has sun glasses the lady wearing a white dress 
Two young children 😀 only
 flower girl and  boy Ring bearer for the wedding 

The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Every person in the reference must be represented with their exact appearance, clothing, and accessories.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: An abstract pop art explosion of romantic symbols, styled like an Andy Warhol silkscreen print. The design features a repeating grid pattern of four large squares, each with a different color background: cobalt blue, sunshine yellow, vibrant magenta, and pure white. Inside each square is the same central image: two interlocking wedding rings, rendered with bold, graphic black lines. The rings in each square are filled with a contrasting pop art color. The background of the entire page is subtly textured with fine halftone dots, creating a cohesive piece that is both modern and emotionally resonant, capturing the joyful repetition of love and commitment.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior:
A dynamic pop art composition designed to frame the heartfelt message. The background is a bright cobalt blue with a subtle white Ben-Day dot pattern. On the left side of the page, a graphic, comic-book-style heart shape "bursts" with radiating yellow and magenta lines, creating an energetic focal point. The message is elegantly integrated within a large, white, cloud-like speech bubble that dominates the center of the page. The text is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script with a natural, flowing pen-style appearance: "Dearest Michael and Alexis,

Your beautiful family from Smithtown traveled all the way to this incredible day in Greece. Your love story is an inspiration, and we are so honored to celebrate with you as you begin this new chapter together. May your life be as vibrant, joyful, and full of love as your wedding day!

All our love,
The Gilbert Family". The design is clean, bold, and frames the personal message as the star of the show, full of love and pop art energy.
